items.name: Advanced Assembler
items.description: Module that produces other modules and logistics units.

items.name: Advanced Miner Bot
items.description: A drone that will mine ore and dump it in mining stations.

items.name: Advanced Mining Station
items.description: Place near an asteroid and give it mining drones to automate mining.

items.name: Advanced Ship Assembler
items.description: Constructs ships. Ships will be deployed into the ship logistics network, not into connectors.

items.name: AI Controller Circuit
items.description: A complex circuit used in the operation of automated modules and units.

items.name: Ancient Portal
items.description: An ancient cosmic structure of origins unknown.

items.name: Antimatter Collector
items.description: Attach to an Antimatter Power Station to allow for the collection of antimatter particles in the vacuum of space.

items.name: Antimatter Power Station
items.description: Generates power from antimatter collected from nearby space using Antipower Power Collection sails.

items.name: Assembler
items.description: Automates the production of complex items, stations, and non-fleet logistics units.

items.name: Asteroid Research Bot
items.description: A bot that will scan asteroids when loaded into an Asteroid Research Station. Will self destruct after researching a set amount.

items.name: Asteroid Research Station
items.description: Place near asteroids to allow Research Bots to automate research.

items.name: Atomic Printer
items.description: Prints intermediate products used in more complex recipes.

items.name: Bat
items.description: A small fiesty fleet ship.

items.name: Bat Dock
items.description: Connect this directly to a Defense Platform or Ship Yard to have it continually request Bats from the ship logistics network.

items.name: Bauxite Asteroid
items.description: Filled with Bauxite Ore for mining.

items.name: Bauxite Ore
items.description: Ore used used printing aluminum based products.

items.name: Black Hole
items.description: A mass of apparent infinite densite, trapping all things that enter its event horizon.

items.name: Breadcrumb
items.description: Keeps the fog revealed for a short time as the player explores

items.name: Cargo Drone
items.description: A longer range ship that can fly over most stations. Can only take items between two Logistics Bays.

items.name: Cargo Hold
items.description: Can hold a small amount of items.

items.name: Comet Catcher
items.description: Pulls in nearby comets so they can be harvested for ice. This module costs no stability.

items.name: Comet Core
items.description: A comet that can be caught and harvested for ice.

items.name: Comet Fragment
items.description: A comet fragment that can be mined for ice and organics

items.name: Comet Harvester
items.description: Extracts resources from comets. Attaches to a comet catcher.

items.name: Connector
items.description: Connects stations together and carries items and power between them.

items.name: Construction Bot
items.description: A little pal that will build things for you

items.name: Dark Star Gate
items.description: A mega structure used for the construction and deployment of the ultimate cosmic vessel, allowing for traversal through a black hole.

items.name: Defense Platform
items.description: Provides area defense via combat units. Provides a bonus ot attack damage and health regen for units stationed here.

items.name: Derelict Outpost
items.description: Used to located the first boss.

items.name: Destroyed Player
items.description: The smoldering remains of the player's ship.

items.name: Duplicator Artifact
items.description: An ancient device that appears to have the ability to increase the production of an entire station grid.

items.name: Dyson Bot
items.description: A bot equipped with a solar panel that will swarm around a star with other bots to form a Dyson Sphere. Will also harvest Exotic Matter from the suns atmosphere.

items.name: Dyson Power Receiver
items.description: Can absorb a high powered energy beam and convert it into electricity.

items.name: Dyson Power Transmitter
items.description: Transmits all excess energy from the station its attached to to the first Dyson Power Receiver in its path.

items.name: Dyson Rotator
items.description: Meta item used to rotate dyson bots around a star

items.name: Dyson Segment
items.description: Place this near a Main Sequence Star to begin construction on one quadrant of the Dyson structure. Capable of generating Exotic Matter when Dyson Drones are assigned to a fully constructed segment.

items.name: Enemy Camp
items.description: The item config for enemy camps

items.name: Exotic Matter
items.description: Matter found in the sun's atmosphere

items.name: Exploration Center
items.description: Responsible for deploying Exploration Drones into the great unknown.

items.name: Explorer Bot
items.description: A bot that will fly in a straight light until it crashes into something. It's crash location will be shown on your map.

items.name: Explorer Crash Site
items.description: Shows where an explorer bot crashed on the map

items.name: Fabricator
items.description: Device for printing structures at the atomic level.

items.name: Fast Cargo Drone
items.description: A longer range ship that can fly over most stations. Can only take items between two Logistics Bays.

items.name: Fast Inserter Bot
items.description: A drone used to take items from one inventory and place into another. Can fly over connectors and some other buildings.

items.name: Fleet Navigation Center
items.description: Extends your logistics network but houses no ships.

items.name: Fullerene Structure
items.description: An advanced material used to build mega structures.

items.name: Greenhouse Station
items.description: A greenhouse for producing organic materials.

items.name: Hauler
items.description: A large ship capable of carrying large amounts of cargo over long distances

items.name: Hauler Station
items.description: A stop for Haulers to drop off cargo, recharge, and replenish their fleet.

items.name: Heat Exchanger
items.description: Pulls in heat from the grid it's connected to and transfers that heat to connected radiators. Can also dissipate a small amount of heat itself.

items.name: High Density Station Core
items.description: Provides a lot of stability to stations. Only one Station Core per grid can confer stability to the grid.

items.name: High Density Structure
items.description: A hardy structure used in the production of many items.

items.name: High Energy Connector
items.description: Connects stations together and carries items and power between them.

items.name: High Energy Laser
items.description: A laser with many engineering uses.

items.name: Ice
items.description: A chunk of ice.

items.name: Indomitable Obelisk
items.description: This Obelisk can grant your ship a hardening effect, increasing its hitpoints.

items.name: Inserter Bot
items.description: A drone used to take items from one inventory and place into another. Can fly over connectors and some other buildings.

items.name: Iron Asteroid
items.description: Filled with Iron Ore for mining.

items.name: Iron Ore
items.description: Used to make hard stuff.

items.name: Junction
items.description: Splits items evenly to all connected connectors.

items.name: Knight
items.description: A small tanky ship.

items.name: Knight Dock
items.description: Connect this directly to a Defense Platform or Ship Yard to have it continually request Knights from the ship logistics network.

items.name: Krillo
items.description: A long range ship capable of firing extrmely destructive discs of energy.

items.name: Large Cargo Hold
items.description: Can hold a large amount of items.

items.name: Logistics Bay
items.description: Cargo drones and inserters can take and drop off items here.

items.name: Ancient Treasure
items.description: A box full of shiny stuff.

items.name: Loot Pickupable
items.description: An orb that contains goodies that will float to the player

items.name: Low Density Structure
items.description: A common structure comprised primarily of aluminum.

items.name: Main Sequence Star
items.description: A star in the prime of its life. Capable of housing a Dyson Sphere.

items.name: Medium Density Structure
items.description: A common structure comprised primarily of iron.

items.name: Miner Bot
items.description: A bot that will mine ore and dump it in mining stations. It will self destruct after gathering a certain number of ore.

items.name: Mining Station
items.description: Place near an asteroid and give it mining drones to automate mining.

items.name: Neutron Star
items.description: The collapsed core of massive supergiant star. Provides a large research bonus.

items.name: Obliterator Disc
items.description: The item config for the obliterator disc effect

items.name: Organic Compounds
items.description: Material made up of complex organic molecules.

items.name: Organic Polymer
items.description: It's a fancy word for plastic.

items.name: Planetary Research Bot
items.description: A bot that will scan planets when loaded into a Planetary Research Station.

items.name: Planetary Research Station
items.description: Place near planets to allow Planetary Research Bots to automate research.

items.name: Plasma Engine Parts
items.description: The complex parts needed to assemble a plasma engine. Plasma engines do not use conventional fuel, they instead rely on electrcity.

items.name: Player
items.description: The player!

items.name: Power Receiver
items.description: Can absorb an energy beam and convert it into electricity.

items.name: Power Transmitter
items.description: Transmits a limited amount of excess energy from the station its attached to to the first Power Receiver in its path.

items.name: Quantum Computer
items.description: Leverages quantum properties to perform complex calculations.

items.name: Quantum Printer
items.description: Prints intermediate products used in more complex recipes. Harnesses the quantum properties of quarks and subatmoic forces to create items faster than ever.

items.name: Radiator Artifact
items.description: An ancient relic capable of dissipating heat from any station grid it's attached to.

items.name: Radiator
items.description: Attaches directly to heat exchangers and dissipates a large amount of heat from the grid.

items.name: Razor
items.description: Enemy unit that fires homing missiles.

items.name: Razor Missile Splash
items.description: Splash damage effect for razor missiles

items.name: Razor Spawner
items.description: Spawns enemy Razor ships in the area

items.name: Recycled Asteroid Research Bot
items.description: The recycled bits of an asteroid research bot. Use it to make more complex research bots.

items.name: Recycled Miner Bot
items.description: The recycled bits of a miner bot.

items.name: Recycled Planetary Research Bot
items.description: The recycled bits of a planetary research bot. Use it to make more complex research bots.

items.name: Red Giant Star
items.description: A star nearing the end of its life, ready to supernova at any moment.

items.name: Repair Center
items.description: Attaches direction to a station and provides a small healing effect to all connected structures.

items.name: Research Pickupable
items.description: An orb that contains goodies that will float to the player

items.name: Rich Bauxite Asteroid
items.description: Filled with Bauxite Ore for mining.

items.name: Rich Iron Asteroid
items.description: Filled with Iron Ore for mining.

items.name: Rich Silica Asteroid
items.description: Filled with Silica Ore for mining.

items.name: Robotic Parts
items.description: Various parts used in the construction of robots.

items.name: Ship Assembler
items.description: Constructs ships. Ships will be deployed into the ship logistics network, not into connectors.

items.name: Ship Reprocessing Plant
items.description: A place for ships to go to be churned up into spare parts.

items.name: Ship Yard
items.description: Houses ships waiting to be deployed to the logistics network. Costs no stability.

items.name: Silica Asteroid
items.description: Filled with Silica Ore for mining.

items.name: Silica Ore
items.description: Used primarily for printing computing components.

items.name: Singularity Circuit
items.description: A complex circuit composed of mini singularities, leveraging the curvature of spacetime to make computations and navigate difficult geometric conditions (like those present in Black Holes).

items.name: Singularity Engine
items.description: An engine that manipulates the curvature of space time to generate momentum.

items.name: Singularity Field Generator
items.description: A device used to create immense spacetime curvature in small area.

items.name: Singularity Power Station
items.description: Destroys any item it receives and converts it into energy based on its mass.

items.name: Singularity Vessel
items.description: A spacecraft capable of traversing through a black hole. Constructed at a Dark Star Gate.

items.name: Small Ship Core
items.description: The core structure and functionality for small ships.

items.name: Solar Panel
items.description: Attaches directly to station cores to provide power to it and any directly attached modules.

items.name: Solid State Laser
items.description: A laser with many engineering uses.

items.name: Space Rocks
items.description: Rocks with no partcular value floating around space.

items.name: Spawner Chest
items.description: Will automatically spawn selected inventory item

items.name: Stabilizer Artifact
items.description: An ancient device that grants stability to any grid it's connected to.

items.name: Station Core
items.description: Provides a lot of stability to stations. Only one Station Core per grid can confer stability to the grid.

items.name: Stellar Research Bot
items.description: A bot that will scan points of interest when loaded into a Research Station. Can research stars.

items.name: Stellar Research Station
items.description: Place near stars to allow Stellar Research Bots to automate research.

items.name: Stinger
items.description: Basic enemy unit

items.name: Stinger Spawner
items.description: Spawns Stinger enemies in the area

items.name: Strut
items.description: Connects stations together and negates the stability cost of the smaller station up to a maximum of 5, unless the smaller station costs no stability, then the larger station will have its stability reduced by up to 5 instead.

items.name: Terra World
items.description: A world filled with life.

items.name: Trash Can
items.description: Destroys everything you feed it.

items.name: Warp Obelisk
items.description: This Obelisk can grant your ship the power to manipulate the geometry of space, increasing its speed.
